# Welcome!

![](images/Portrait_Tobias-Dienlin_2025_16-9.jpg){fig-alt="Portrait of Tobias Dienlin" .profile}

My name is Tobias Dienlin. I'm a professor for Media Psychology and Methods at the [Department of Communication](https://www.ikmz.uzh.ch/de/department/people/professors/tobias-dienlin.html), University of Zurich.

My research interests include media effects, well-being, privacy, and open science.

On this website, you can find a blog where I occasionally write about research and current findings. You can also find the current version of my CV.

Please always feel free to reach out! You can find me on [Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/tobiasdienlin.com), [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=z0bojUIAAAAJ), [ORCID](https://orcid.org/0000-0002-6875-8083), [GitHub](https://github.com/tdienlin), or send me an [email](mailto:tobias.dienlin@uzh.ch)
